title: Did Facebook Suspend the Account of the Whistleblower Who Exposed Cambridge Analytica?
subtitle: The social media giant suspended Christopher Wylie's account after he went public with accusations that the psychographics firm abused the platform.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Whistleblower Christopher Wylie's Facebook account was suspended after he came forward with allegations that Cambridge Analytica improperly acquired users' profile data.
